title: How tanks think their fights look like

replies.body: the door is right this way dear sir

I don't play Tanks. I play Juggernauts.
http://i.imgur.com/d3Uq3iF.jpg¿noredirect

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YUuUP07fdI0/UdxNXOtPKkI/AAAAAAAAG9o/mIu1cjqELP4/s1600/Pacific+Rim+Jaeger+Gypsy+Danger+punching+still+meme.jpg
{{champion:420}} Have I told you about nagakabouros the god of juggernauts? {{champion:420}}
You did. I didn't like it.
As a Garen main, I would like to think my tank fights look a little more like an epic beyblade duel.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Daguava,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=sxY5Ih1w,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-07-17T07:50:38.215+0000)
>
> As a Garen main, I would like to think my tank fights look a little more like an epic beyblade duel.

"Oh Garen isn't a tank hes a JUGGERNAUT. get your facts straight"

every one on this forum.
Hey, I am just saying a fight is COOL with Garen.
But Garen is hardly a tank. He is a juggernaut. That would make it like the fight of Jaeger vs Kaju.

TBH, The first one is a tank fight, its just Mecha Zero {{champion:14}} vs {{champion:31}} , which, unlike Malph vs Rammus is pretty cool to watch because they'll constantly try to dodge each other skillshots while hitting their own...

http://31.media.tumblr.com/befe456d931e66fe4b64af9cc64eb516/tumblr_mu7qice6Iz1qc3vhao4_400.gif
I'll just use my sword then. No skillshots involved anymore.

Yea, I'll just start using my sword after destroying the city & unnecessarily used the containers & a ship as a sword.

- Pacific Rim logic

Hey, dont speak about the city. Only a couple of streets and the harbor, nothing wrong. 

Now the ship was one heck of a cool club. You got to admit that.

Lol, I had flashbacks to tank Alistar vs tank Alistar on Urf...... I swear we were just knocking eachother around for a good 2-5 minutes until our teams came xD we wouldnt let eachother leave but there wasnt anything we could do to eachother xD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SimMH3Q6zLw

I think this is a better example :)
actually tanks in season 6 are more like the first picture. full tank = more damage then carrys
shoulda used mecha malphite in gif
And then the jungler comes in and ruins it all
